description:
Tachibana Genya (a former employee of "Ginei")is a director at "Studio Lotus" who is working on a documentary about a famous actress, Fujiwara Chiyoko. In her old age, Chiyoko has withdrawn from public life, but Tachibana found her location and received Chiyoko`s permission to do the documentary.
He is a great admirer of Chiyoko and with his cameraman he records the story of Chiyoko`s life.
name: Tachibana Genya
